name: Friend Guard
summary: Reduces damage done to an ally by 25% in Doubles and Triples.
viability: Useless in singles, but pretty good in Doubles and Triples. 25% doesn't seem like much, but in reality it makes all the difference between a potential 2HKO and a 3HKO. The only problem is that mostly baby Pokémon and first stage evolutions (outside Vivillon and Spewpa) have access to this ability, and these Pokémon aren't particularly useful.
